songs.title: Ball Everyday*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from snippet

[Verse 1: Lil Skies]
They all gon' sing along
You ain't ever say you was proud, you just pointed out my wrongs
So, get the fuck out of my face
People be annoying, tryna' envy my space
I don't wanna hear it, I am not the one today
I would like to change my ways, that's what I told you
But, these niggas love to hate, I'm going Goku
I ride or die for my clique
Ain't switchin', I ain't no bitch
Me and NBA, we ball everyday, they wanna live like this
I'm a superstar, I got rich
I done did this shit with no wish
Hard work, I had to take risks
Now my crib got a big fence
I don't trust people, that's lame
